idea-plugin.name: Swag Import Apifox
idea-plugin.description:
Swag Import Apifox - Go API Documentation Sync Tool

Automatically generate Swagger documentation from Go code comments and sync to Apifox with one click, improving API documentation management efficiency!

Key Features

  • ğŸ¯ Auto Generation: Generate Swagger docs from Go code comments automatically
  • ğŸ“¤ One-Click Upload: Sync generated docs directly to Apifox projects
  • ğŸ”„ Smart Merge: Support multiple interface merge strategies to avoid duplicates
  • âš™ï¸ Flexible Configuration: Customize upload directories and merge rules
  • ğŸ“Š Real-time Feedback: Detailed operation logs and result statistics

Quick Start

1. Environment Setup

  • âœ… Go Environment: Go 1.16 or higher
  • âœ… GoLand/IntelliJ IDEA: 2023.1 or higher
  • âœ… Swag Tool: Auto-install or manual install go install github.com/swaggo/swag/cmd/swag@latest
  • âœ… Apifox Account: Need API Token and Project ID

2. Code Comment Example

// @title My API
// @version 1.0
// @description API service description
// @host localhost:8080
// @BasePath /api/v1

// @Summary Get user information
// @Description Get detailed information by user ID
// @Tags User Management
// @Accept json
// @Produce json
// @Param id path int true "User ID"
// @Success 200 {object} User
// @Router /users/{id} [get]
func getUser(c *gin.Context) {
    // Implementation code
}

3. Plugin Configuration

Open Settings/Preferences â†’ Tools â†’ Swag2Apifox

Configuration Guide

Apifox Configuration

  • API Secret Key: Apifox API Token, get from Personal Settings
  • Project ID: Target project ID, view in project settings (Required)
  • Parent Folder ID: Parent directory ID, sync to root if empty
  • Endpoint Overwrite Behavior: Interface merge strategy
    • ğŸ”„ Overwrite Existing: Overwrite existing interfaces
    • ğŸ”— Auto Merge: Auto merge (Recommended)
    • ğŸ’¾ Keep Existing: Keep existing interfaces
    • â• Create New: Create new interfaces
  • Add Base Path: Whether to add base path to interface paths

Swag Configuration

  • Parse Dependency: Whether to scan entities in dependency packages (default off, slower scanning)

Usage Steps

  1. Add Swagger comments to Go project
  2. Configure Apifox connection information
  3. Open right tool window Swag2Apifox
  4. Click Generate & Upload button
  5. View operation logs and confirm successful upload

Common Issues

  • Q: "swag command not found" error
    A: Run go install github.com/swaggo/swag/cmd/swag@latest to install
  • Q: "No swagger file found" error
    A: Check if Swagger comments in Go code are correct, view detailed logs to locate issues
  • Q: Upload failed
    A: Check if API Token and Project ID are correct, confirm network connection

Related Resources

  • ğŸ“– Swag Official Documentation
  • ğŸ“– Apifox Help Documentation
  • ğŸ› Issue Feedback

Use Cases

  • Go microservice API documentation management
  • Interface synchronization in team collaboration
  • API documentation version control
  • Frontend-backend interface integration

Make API documentation management simple and efficient! ğŸ‰

idea-plugin.change-notes:
ğŸ‰ v1.6 - Major Improvement Release

  • ğŸ”§ Core Issue Fix: Completely resolved "No swagger file found" error
  • ğŸ“Š Enhanced Debugging: Added detailed operation logs and error diagnostics
  • âš¡ File Processing Optimization: Improved file system refresh mechanism for better reliability
  • ğŸ› ï¸ Error Handling Improvement: Provided more user-friendly error messages and solutions
  • ğŸ“ Documentation Update: Updated plugin introduction and usage guide
  • ğŸš€ High Version Compatibility: Enhanced compatibility with GoLand 2024.1+ and IntelliJ IDEA 2024.1+
  • ğŸ”§ UI Component Optimization: Updated UI components for better compatibility with newer IDE versions
  • ğŸ“¦ Dependency Updates: Updated OkHttp to 4.12.0 and added Gson 2.10.1 for better performance

ğŸš€ v1.5 - Feature Enhancement Release

  • âš™ï¸ New Configuration Options: Added dependency scanning toggle, disabled by default for better performance
  • ğŸ§¹ Configuration Simplification: Removed manual GOROOT and GOPATH configuration, auto-detection enabled
  • ğŸ› Upload Issue Fix: Resolved issue where upload failed when docs folder was empty
  • ğŸ“ˆ Performance Optimization: Improved processing speed for large projects

âœ¨ v1.4 - Feature Completion Release

  • ğŸ›£ï¸ BasePath Support: Option to add base path to interface paths
  • ğŸ”§ Bug Fixes: Fixed multiple known issues, improved stability
  • ğŸ“± UI Improvements: Optimized user interface, enhanced user experience
  • ğŸ“š Documentation Updates: Improved usage instructions and configuration guide

ğŸ¯ Version Compatibility

  • âœ… Go Version: Supports Go 1.16+
  • âœ… IDE Version: Supports IntelliJ IDEA 2023.1+ (GoLand 2023.1+)
  • âœ… Swag Version: Supports latest version of swag tool
